results.title: Investigation of the effects of astaxanthin in experimental polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) in rats
results.text_hl: Routine @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy plays a key role in the reduction of cystic follicles in @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@.

results.title: Insulin Sensitizers for Improving the Endocrine and Metabolic Profile in Overweight Women With PCOS
results.text_hl: For @DISEASE_Overweight @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@, both @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combined with @GENE_GLP1R @GENE_2740 @@@GLP-1 receptor@@@ agonists and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combined with @CHEMICAL_Thiazolidinediones @CHEMICAL_MESH:D045162 @@@TZDs@@@ appear superior to monotherapy in improving @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@hyperandrogenemia@@@.

results.title: Study on the Effect of Berberine, Myoinositol, and Metformin in Women with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome: A Prospective Randomised Study
results.text_hl: ...Conclusions: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, the classical drug used in @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@, improves all the parameters in @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@.

results.title: A comparison of the effects of cinnamon, ginger, and metformin consumption on metabolic health, anthropometric indices, and sexual hormone levels in women with poly cystic ovary syndrome: A randomized double-blinded placebo-controlled clinical trial
results.text_hl: A total of 100 @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ were randomly assigned to one of the following four groups: cinnamon (500 mg of cinnamon, 3 x day), ginger (500 mg of ginger, 3 x day), @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (500 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 3 x day) or placebo.
